title: neonprod-portfolio

text: this site is the portfolio of my friend jade from neon prod.uction. it's the very first site i've done for someone. i did it for a class assignment with 3 friends including jade. we got a 20/20. in addition to the visuals you can see, the site also contains an admin page to manage the content of the portfolio.
